redFlags.title: The I'm so busy dude
redFlags.description: I get it, ok? This is NYC, we're all very busy, work is cracy, competition is insane, we're always hustlin. But the truth is that he made time at first, if he wants he'll make time, sending a text or a minute call a day is not that hard.

redFlags.title: The rollercoster
redFlags.description: Consistency is the key, do what you preach and preach what you do.

redFlags.title: The eternal bachelor
redFlags.description: You're not your early 20's, but your ongest relationship was less than a year.

redFlags.title: Mr. let's meet at your/mine apt only
redFlags.description: Unless you're cool with just that type of relationship, always always a red flag.

redFlags.title: The has more than one baby mom
The RedPill dude
redFlags.description: Follows, quotes or suport the RedPill blogs, podcasts or influencers (like Andrew Tate).

redFlags.title: The secretive
redFlags.description: Do you have a gut feeling? Probnably he is no being trnsparent. Hides his phone screen when you're around, hides information from you.

redFlags.title: The love Bomber
redFlags.description: Nobody falls in love that fast! Beware of the nercisists.

redFlags.title: The ladies man
redFlags.description: Womanizer, always has new girls popping out of nowhere.
